languages.text: "Зачем ты украл десятину? Ты правда рассчитывал скрыться от гнева Империума?"
"Why did you steal the tithe? Did you really think you could escape the Imperium's wrath?"
languages.original_text: "Зачем ты украл десятину? Ты правда рассчитывал скрыться от гнева Империума?"

traits.locale_text: "Why did you steal the tithe? Did you really think you could escape the Imperium's wrath?"
"Why did you steal the tithe? Did you really think you could escape the Imperium's wrath?"
"Why did you steal the tithe? Did you really think you could escape the Imperium's wrath?"
"Why did you steal the tithe? Did you really think you could escape the Imperium's wrath?"
"Why did you steal the tithe? Did you really think you could escape the Imperium's wrath?"
"Why did you steal the tithe? Did you really think you could escape the Imperium's wrath?"

languages.text: «¿Por qué has robado el diezmo? ¿De verdad creías que podrías escapar de la furia del Imperium?».
languages.original_text: "Why did you steal the tithe? Did you really think you could escape the Imperium's wrath?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué has robado el diezmo? ¿De verdad creías que podrías escapar de la furia del Imperium?».

languages.text: “你为什么要盗窃什一税？难道你真的以为能逃过帝国的怒火吗？”
languages.original_text: "Why did you steal the tithe? Did you really think you could escape the Imperium's wrath?"

traits.locale_text: “你为什么要盗窃什一税？难道你真的以为能逃过帝国的怒火吗？”

languages.text: « Pourquoi avez-vous volé la dîme ? Vous pensiez vraiment pouvoir échapper à la colère de l'Imperium ? »
languages.original_text: "Why did you steal the tithe? Did you really think you could escape the Imperium's wrath?"

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi avez-vous volé la dîme ? Vous pensiez vraiment pouvoir échapper à la colère de l'Imperium ? »

languages.text: 「なぜ租税を盗んだんだ？帝国の怒りから逃れられるとでも思ったのか？」
languages.original_text: "Why did you steal the tithe? Did you really think you could escape the Imperium's wrath?"

traits.locale_text: 「なぜ租税を盗んだんだ？帝国の怒りから逃れられるとでも思ったのか？」

languages.text: "Aşarı neden çaldın? İmparatorluk'un gazabından kaçabileceğini mi sandın?"
languages.original_text: "Why did you steal the tithe? Did you really think you could escape the Imperium's wrath?"

traits.locale_text: "Aşarı neden çaldın? İmparatorluk'un gazabından kaçabileceğini mi sandın?"

languages.text: "Warum habt Ihr den Zehnt gestohlen? Dachtet Ihr wirklich, Ihr würdet dem Zorn des Imperiums entkommen?"
languages.original_text: "Why did you steal the tithe? Did you really think you could escape the Imperium's wrath?"

traits.locale_text: "Warum habt Ihr den Zehnt gestohlen? Dachtet Ihr wirklich, Ihr würdet dem Zorn des Imperiums entkommen?"
